title: Strategies for Improving Online Learning Awareness and Overcoming Challenges

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and ability to use mobile devices
context.additional_context: A course designed for practicing professionals to strengthen language learning competencies linked to their work, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, including collaborative tasks among learners

learning_goals: Learners can independently explore and apply language learning content using key features of online learning platforms
Learners can propose and apply at least three time management and motivation strategies in online learning environments
Learners can memorize and use 20 workplace-appropriate language expressions via digital communication tools (email, video conferencing, etc.)
Learners can analyze technical/psychological barriers in online learning and propose solutions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
